SELECT Book.b_price * Purchase.p_amount FROM Book, Purchase INNER JOIN Orders ON Orders.o_id = Purchase.p_o_id WHERE Purchase.p_b_isbn = Book.b_isbn AND Orders.o_date between to_date(#{Start_Date}, 'yy/mm/dd') and to_date(#{End_Date}, 'yy/mm/dd') and Purchase.p_s_id = #{s_id}
